TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi HeaderedContentControl extends System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl

summary.span: 为包含单项内容并具有标头的所有控件提供基实现。

span.span: Provides the base implementation for all controls that contain single content and have a header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 继承属性从，并定义的类型的属性。 inherits the property from and defines the property that is of type . 提供控件的标题。 provides a heading for the control. 像的属性，则可以是任何类型。Like the property of a , the can be any type. 下图显示了两个对象，它们继承自。The following illustration shows two objects, which inherit from . 第一个已对象作为内容在这种并:设置为，其中包含和一个;设置为 ，其中包含和一个。The first has objects as the content in both the and the : the is set to a that contains an and a ; the is set to a that contains a and a . 第二个设置为一个字符串，并设置为一个。The of the second is set to a string and the is set to a single . ![TabControl](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelteabitem.PNG "TabControl")![TabControl](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelteabitem.PNG "TabControl") 与标头属性中的不同类型的 TabControlTabControl with different types in the Header property 一个具有有限的默认样式。A has a limited default style. 应用程序开发人员可以创建，但其外观将是非常简单。An application developer can create a , but its appearance will be very simple. 如果你想要提高控件的外观，可以创建一个新。If you wish to enhance the appearance of the control, you can create a new . 一个可用于创建自定义控件，因为它具有标头的单一内容控件提供一个模型。A is useful for creating custom controls because it provides a model for single content controls with headers. 该控件的依赖关系属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置为默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值时该控件将出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题使用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建备注部分中所示。The following example shows how to create the shown in the Remarks section. [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#16)] 以下示例演示如何创建为。The following examples show how to create a for a . [!code-xaml[HeaderedContentControl#HeaderedContentControlStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headeredcontentcontrolstyle)] [!code-xaml[HeaderedContentControl#HeaderedContentControl](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headeredcontentcontrol)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 像的属性，则可以是任何类型。Like the property of a , the can be any type. 使用相同的逻辑来显示中描述的。The uses the same logic to display the that is described in . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例创建包含两个对象，它们继承自。The following example creates a that contains two objects, which inherit from . 第一个已对象作为内容在这种并:设置为，其中包含和一个;设置为 ，其中包含和一个。The first has objects as the content in both the and the : the is set to a that contains an and a ; the is set to a that contains a and a . 第二个设置为一个字符串，并设置为一个。The of the second is set to a string and the is set to a single . [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#16)] 下图显示创建上面的示例。The following illustration shows the created by the previous example. ![TabControl](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelteabitem.PNG "TabControl")![TabControl](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelteabitem.PNG "TabControl") 与标头属性中的不同类型的 TabControlTabControl with different types in the Header property 下面的示例创建两个对象来指定的外观并的。The following example creates two objects to specify the appearance of the and of the . summary.span: 获取或设置一个撰写字符串，该字符串指定如果 属性显示为字符串，应如何设置该属性的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the property if it is displayed as a string.

value.span: 一个撰写字符串，指定如果 属性显示为字符串，应如何设置该属性的格式。

span.span: A composite string that specifies how to format the property if it is displayed as a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以是预定义、 撰写的或自定义字符串格式。 can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format. 有关字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 如果您设置或的属性，则属性将被忽略。If you set the or property of a , the property is ignored. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 **，则返回 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|无None| ## Examples 以下示例将绑定的一系列`Student`对象。The following example binds a to a collection of `Student` objects. `Student`类具有`Name`属性中，一系列`Course`对象，并实现方法来返回`Name`的学生或列出学生的课程的字符串。The `Student` class has a `Name` property, a collection of `Course` objects, and implements the method to return either the `Name` of the student or a string that lists the student's courses. 该示例使用若要将学生的名称放在的每个(后者又继承)，并若要显示的内容中的每个学生的课程列表。The example uses to put a student's name in the of each (which inherits from ), and the to display the course list for each student in the Content of the . [!code-xaml[ContentStringSnippets#TabControl](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#tabcontrol)] 下面的示例实现方法来返回`Name`的学生或列出学生的课程的字符串。The following example implements the method to return either the `Name` of the student or a string that lists the student's courses. [!code-csharp[ContentStringSnippets#TabControlToString](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#tabcontroltostring)] [!code-vb[ContentStringSnippets#TabControlToString](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#tabcontroltostring)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于显示控件标头的内容的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template used to display the content of the control's header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *TemplateResourceKey**TemplateResourceKey* 标识所请求的模板的键。The key that identifies the template being requested. 键引用中的现有资源。The key refers to an existing resource in a . > [!NOTE] > 属性元素语法就从技术上讲，但不是建议这样做。Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended. 请参阅[内联样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md)。See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md). 绑定引用使用，或者也是可行的但不常见。A binding reference using or is also possible, but uncommon. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例创建两个对象来指定的外观并的。The following example creates two objects to specify the appearance of the and of the . [!code-xaml[HeaderedContentControl#HeaderTemplate1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headertemplate1)] [!code-xaml[HeaderedContentControl#HeaderTemplate2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headertemplate2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个数据模板选择器，以提供自定义逻辑来选择用于显示标头的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets a data template selector that provides custom logic for choosing the template used to display the header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果这两个和设置属性，将忽略模板选择器属性。If both the and the properties are set, the template selector property is ignored. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation**MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation* 一个类派生自实现实用的重写。A class derived from that implements a practical override. 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 WPF XAML Namespace 映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *DataTemplateSelectorClassKey**DataTemplateSelectorClassKey* 标识选择器实现所请求的键。The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested. 该密钥是指派生类实现在实际的重写。The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical override. 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 WPF XAML Namespace 映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). 你可以以编程方式添加的实例在作为资源的资源字典的类。You can also programmatically add an instance of your class as a resource to a resource dictionary. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
